jabber.BOSHConnection

type
class
extends
jabber.stream.Connection
available in
flash, js
Bidirectional-streams Over Synchronous HTTP (BOSH)
XMPP Over BOSH

Emulates the semantics of a long-lived, bidirectional TCP connection by efficiently using multiple synchronous HTTP request/response pairs without requiring the use of frequent polling or chunked responses.

Constructor

new(host : String, path : String, ?hold : Int, ?wait : Int, ?secure : Bool, ?maxConcurrentRequests : Int, ?timeoutOffset : Int)
A new connection to a HTTP gateway of a jabber server.
The default wait time for responses is 30 seconds.

pause(secs : Null<Int>) : Bool
